long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhancements for Unleashed inventory management system:

> Check and update the exchange rate for your Purchase orders, Sales orders, Sales invoices and Credit notes in Unleashed with this extension. No need to settle for Unleashed's fixed exchange rate or to manually check the exchange rate whenever you create or update an order.

> Add a short URL to sales order, sales invoices and sales quotes to allow your customers to pay using ezyCollect

This extension requires a 9.95USD per month subscription but you can start using it today with a 14 day free trial. No credit card or registration required for the trial.

Simply install this extension and either view an existing PO/SO/CN/SI or create a new one. For documentation go to https://websapp.solutions/unleashed-assistant-documentation/
